Coordinated Defense: +2 CMD (+4 vs. larger foe) when an adjacent ally has this feat
Divine Weapon: May add 6 enhancements and properties to weapon for 20 min 4/dy
Elemental Channel (Air): May use Channel Energy to heal or harm Air outsiders
Shining Light: 30' radius inflicts 10d6 HP and 1 rd blindness on evil creatures (1d4 rd blindness on outsider, dragon, or undead) (DC 23 Ref half HP only); good creatures regain 10d6 HP and gain +2 ability checks, attack, saves, and skill checks for 1 rd 3/dy
Smite Evil: May gain +3 attack, +20 HP damage, bypass DR, and +3 AC vs. chosen evil foe (+40 HP on first hit vs. antipaladin, outsider, dragon, or undead) 7/dy
Step Up: May match foe 5' step

Aura Of Courage: Immune to fear/R10' Allies +4 vs. fear
Aura Of Resolve: Immune to charm/R10' Allies gain +4 vs. charm
Aura Of Righteousness: Immune to compulsion/R10' Allies gain +4 vs. compulsion

Magic
Spells:

Magic Notes:
Charisma Channel Energy Adjustment: +3
Power Of Faith: +5 daily uses of Lay On Hands
Channel Energy: R30' May heal or inflict 10d6 HP (DC 23 Will half) 6/dy
Channel Positive Energy: May expend 2 Lay On Hands uses to use Channel Energy effects
Detect Evil: May use Detect Evil effects at will
Holy Champion: Lay On Hands effects maximized/Smite Evil inflicts Banishment effects (DC 20 neg)
Lay On Hands: May harm undead or heal 10d6 HP 14/dy
Mercy: Lay On Hands removes blinded, deafened, diseased, paralyzed, poisoned, shaken
Power Of Faith-1: May use Lay On Hands for a 60' radius that acts a as Daylight spell and gives allies +2 AC, attack, damage, and saves vs. fear, 20 resistance to chosen energy, 50% chance of negating crit damage, and healing of 2d4 ability damage for 1 min
Selective Channeling: May withhold Channel Energy effects from up to 3 targets
